subject: Wages and Salaries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia, who made $457,000 last season while winning the American League M.V.P. award, agreed to a six-year, $40.5 million contract.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia, who made $457,000 last season while winning the American League M.V.P. award, agreed to a six-year, $40.5 million contract.
